  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:DD100_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>DD100_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">The meaning of crime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bedeutung des Verbrechens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La signification du crime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O meaning do crime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il significato del crimine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έννοια του εγκλήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El significado del crimen</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">‘Tough on the causes of crime.’ A famous phrase, but what is crime? This unit examines how we as a ‘society’ define crime. You will look at the fear that is generated within communities and what evidence is available to support claims that are made about crime rates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Crime</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">?Tough auf den Ursachen des Verbrechens? 
Eine berühmte Phrase, aber was ist Verbrechen? Diese 
Maßeinheit überprüft wie wir als?society? definieren Sie 
Verbrechen. Sie betrachten die Furcht, die innerhalb der 
Gemeinschaften festgelegt wird und welcher Beweis vorhanden ist, 
Ansprüche zu unterstützen, die über Verbrechensraten gebildet 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">?Tough sur les causes du crime ? Une 
expression célèbre, mais ce qui est crime ? Cette unité 
examine comment nous en tant que ?society ? définissez le 
crime. Vous regarderez la crainte qui est produite au sein des 
communautés et le quel évidence est disponible pour supporter les 
réclamations qui sont faites au sujet des cadences de crime.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">?Tough nas causas do crime? Uma frase 
famosa, mas o que é crime? Esta unidade examina como nós como 
um?society? defina o crime. Você olhará o medo que são 
gerados dentro das comunidades e o que evidência está disponível 
para suportar as reivindicações que são feitas sobre taxas de 
crime.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">?Tough sulle cause del crimine? Una frase 
famosa, ma che cosa è crimine? Questa unità esamina come noi 
come un?society? definisca il crimine. Guarderete il 
timore che è generato all'interno delle Comunità ed il che prova è 
a disposizione per sostenere i reclami che sono fatti circa i tassi di
crimine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">?Tough στις αιτίες του εγκλήματος; Μια 
διάσημη φράση, αλλά τι είναι έγκλημα; Αυτή η μονάδα 
εξετάζει πώς εμείς ως ?society; καθορίστε το έγκλημα. 
Θα εξετάσετε το φόβο που παράγεται εντός των κοινοτήτων και
ποια στοιχεία είναι διαθέσιμα στις αξιώσεις υποστήριξης που 
γίνονται για τα ποσοστά εγκλήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿?Tough en las causas del crimen? ¿Una 
frase famosa, pero cuál es crimen? ¿Esta unidad examina cómo 
nosotros como?society? defina el crimen. Usted mirará el 
miedo que se genera dentro de comunidades y qué evidencia está 
disponible para utilizar las demandas que se hacen sobre tarifas de 
crimen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbrechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Société</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Crime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sociedade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Società</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Crimine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έγκλημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sociedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crimen</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
